short_summary: Evaluation of PrairiesCan & PacifiCan Funding Models ".
description: description of Evaluation of PrairiesCan & PacifiCan Funding Models",
full_summary:
===============

**Government Tender Announcement**

### Background

This request for proposal (RFP) is issued by Western Economic Diversification Canada (WD) to evaluate the funding models of PrairiesCan and PacifiCan for their Economic Development Initiative (EDI), Rural Opportunities Fund (ROF), and Indigenous Business Development Services (IBDS). The evaluation aims to inform senior management on renewal efforts and determine the effectiveness and performance of these initiatives.

### Key Requirements

* To evaluate the effectiveness of the "further distribution" and "direct delivery of funding" models
* To identify best practices and areas for improvement
* To determine the impact of these initiatives on western Canadian businesses and the regional economy
* To inform senior management on renewal efforts and determine the effectiveness and performance of these initiatives

### Scope of Work

The contractor will be expected to conduct a thorough analysis of the EDI, ROF, and IBDS funding models, including:

* Evaluating the effectiveness of the models
* Identifying best practices and areas for improvement
* Conducting interviews with key stakeholders, including government officials, business leaders, and community representatives

### Contract Details

* Contract duration: From date of contract to March 31, 2023
* Estimated level of effort: 100 days
* Security requirements: Company minimum security level required is DOS, and resource minimum security level required is Reliability
* Applicable trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and others

### Tendering Process

This RFP is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders (SA Holders) who qualified under Tier 1 for the Business Consulting/Change Management Stream. The Request for Proposal documents will be e-mailed directly to the qualified SA Holders. Bidders are advised to contact the contact named in the Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) for any inquiries.

### Contact Information

* Name: Ryan Bent
* Email: wd.bidbox@prairiescan.gc.ca
* Phone: 403-921-7545

### Notice URL

None available.

### Attachments
